item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, January 9, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. How a handful of X accounts took Elon Musk ‘down the rabbit hole’ on UK politics
2. [Opinion] Pity the middle-sized nations of the world
3. Mexico’s president calls for parts of US to be renamed ‘Mexican America’
4. EU leaders warn Trump not to meddle with Europe’s borders
5. [Opinion] Trump’s icebreaker leaves Greenland and Denmark adrift
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, January 9, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
